metadata.title: CVE-2022-48695 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: scsi:mpt3sas: Fix use-after-free warning Fix the following use-after-freewarning which is observed during controller reset: refcount_t: underflow;use-after-free. WARNING: CPU: 23 PID: 5399 at lib/refcount.c:28refcount_warn_saturate+0xa6/0xf0

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.15.0-1104.115').
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.15.0-2087.93').
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.15.0-2067.73').
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.15.0-2052.57').
